settingPageFeatureGPT.message: Ask OpenAI GPT-3.5 about your archived pages, and it will answer with references. For example, if you ask 'how to make milk tea', this extension will search in your archived pages, find the most relevant page, and answer your question with references. (If you don't like the feature, you can always choose to close it in Settings.)

gptFirst.message: To use this function, please set OpenAI API URL and your own API key in Settings.

settingPageGPTURLDesp.message: OpenAI API URL and API Key

settingPageGPTTestFail.message: Test fail, please check your settings

settingPageGPTURLDespnotes.message: Please provide your own OpenAI API key to make it work.

popupLinkTitle.message: Open link in a new tab

settingPageSettingSearchPageDesp.message: Show Result In Search Engine Page

settingPageSettingWeiboNote.message: Click button to add Weibo as bookmark in Fulltext-Bookmark and can later search them.

settingPageSettingSearchShowBookDesp.message: Show Only Bookmarked Pages In Search Results

settingPageSettingSearchMaxDesp.message: Maximum Number Of Popup Page Search Results

settingPageSettingIndexSizeNote.message: The estimated size of indexed data.

settingPageSettingIndexSizeClearAlert.message: Data clear finished (the rest is the necessary data for extension).

settingPageSettingIndexEveryNote.message: Store every page you visited after this option is enabled.

settingPageSettingIndexBookNote.message: Store page when it is bookmarked.

settingPageSettingIndexDurNote.message: Non-bookmarked page records will be expired after this time, while bookmarked page will be stored forever. Defaults to 60 days, maximum 36500 days.

settingPageSettingIndexExclNote.message: URLs in this list will not be indexed (one address per line, support wildcard).

settingPageRemoteSendnote.message:
Send stored page (defaults only the bookmarked pages) to the custom API address by HTTP POST method. JSON payload example:
{url: 'http://www.example.com/api', title: 'example page', date: 1661607379953, isBookmarked: true}

settingPageRemoteSendEveryDesp.message: Send Every Stored Page To Custom API

settingPageRemoteSendEveryNote.message: Send every page other than bookmarked page to custom API. May cause high traffic.

settingPageFeatureA.message: A better bookmark/browsing history search tool.

settingPageFeatureB.message: Store and index bookmarked page or any page you visit, so you can later fulltext search them.

settingPageFeatureC.message: Best matched search result will be displayed in the search engine page as you search (Google/Bing/Baidu).

settingPageFeatureD.message: Search in the Chrome search bar by typing 'kw' first (short for 'keyword').

settingPageFeatureE.message: Or search in the extension popup page for more results.

settingPageFeatureF.message: Everything stored in local storage, no accounts, no cloud, no privacy issues, totally free.(Except when you use Ask GPT feature, it will send data to OpenAI API. If you don't like it, just close this feature.)

settingPageFeatureG.message: Send your bookmark/browsing history to custom remote API as you like.

settingPageFeatureI.message: Bookmark interesting Weibo and search them!

settingPageAboutThanks.message: If you have any issues or suggestions, please feel free to contact.

settingPageNotice.message: Settings take effect after browsing pages refresh.
